price: E Ele é Quem cria da água um ser humano e faz dele parentes sangüíneos e parentes afins. E teu Senhor é Onipotente.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ بَشَرٗا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبٗا وَصِهۡرٗاۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī khalaqa mina al-māi basharan fajaʿalahu nasaban waṣih'ran wakāna rabbuka qadīran
